:::Sharpedge/Godfather:::

::Sharpedge was hit by 1 of the constricter shots, but only minor 
damage is done to him. He fires 2 missles at Prebon::
~~~~~
::Godfather dodges the constricter shots and fires 15 shots from each 
gun at Prebon::




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Prebons sensors show two incoming missles, he fires two of his own 
to intercept them. the missles collide sending shrapnel in both 
directions, Prebon covers his face to protect himself from any 
serious harm. Shards of metal cut into the Trainer leader but it's 
nothing his internal repairs couldn't handle. the other debris 
strikes the shields causing it to flicker. Prebon fires five shots 
from his constrictor rifle at Godfather and another three at 
Sharpedge.
> 
> (A constrictor rifle fires beams of energy that wrap themselves 
around whatever they hit and squeeze until either the beam touches 
the other side or id runs out of energy.)
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Alloran2@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Sunday, January 07, 2001 4:18 PM
>   Subject: Healing and Fighting
> 
> 
>   :::Starscream/Sharpedge/Godfather::: 
> 
>   ::Starscream reaches the base and walks in. He puts Dollen in a 
CR chamber, 
>   transforms back to jet mode and heads back to the battle:: 
>   ~~~~~ 
>   ::Sharpedge and Godfather are fully healed, and they emerge from 
there CR 
>   chambers:: 
>   Sharpedge: Come on! Lets get back to the battle at the CF! 
>   ::Theyt walk out and realize that there is a battle going on:: 
>   Sharpedge: We might as well stay here. 
>   ~~~~~ 
>   ::Sharpedge fires 2 missles at Prebon:: 
>   ~~~~~ 
>   ::Godfather fires 15 shots from each gun at Slayer:: 
>         eGroups Sponsor
